all.name: Abomination
all.description: Foolish rabble! You are beneath me!

all.description: On Reveal: Move the last enemy card played this turn to this location.

all.description: Agatha starts in your hand and plays your cards for you.

all.description: On Reveal: Add a random card to your hand.

After you play a card here,
+1 Power.

all.description: Ongoing: Cards at this location can't be destroyed.

all.description: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your opponent's hand.

At the end of the game, move to a location that wins you the
